Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry;
I*m more than willing to help out on the Resolutions
Committee in any way I can. At the moment, it*s not
definite whether it*ll be possible for me to be in San
Francisco; this may help swing a positive decision.
Sorry to learn about your official termination of relationÂ¬
ship with the N.A.E.B. You'll undoubtedly continue as an
active participant in many of its activities, but having the
pressure of administration off should please you a great
deal.
Sincerely,
James A. Fellows
